meanings.meaning: It basically means the PCM detected either an excessive current draw, or an open or short in the circuit powering the oxygen sensor's heater circuit. This is in reference to the Heated Oxygen Sensor (2) located rear of catalytic converter (Bank 2).

causes.cause: HO2S is damaged or has failed PCM has failed
HO2S signal tracking (due to oil or moisture in the connector)

descriptions.description: Oxygen O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage (Bank 2, Sensor 2)

solutions.solution: Repair damaged connector due to tracking
Repair open or short in ground circuit
Repair open or short in power circuit

symptoms.symptom: There will likely be no obvious symptoms other than MIL illumination.
